column4: Help! I compiled my own kernel. But was failed. I cannot enter my grub kernel choose menu, either. How can I solve it? Thanks
use live disk, mount drive and fix grub
But I don't have a live disk right now. Do you know where can I download a small iso image and the write it to my usb disk?
follow instructions here: http://www.ubuntu.com/desktop/get-ubuntu/download  .  If you want a small one, your gonna have to google that
